Deathtouch.Effect: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it

Double Strike.Effect: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage

First Strike.Effect: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike

Flying.Effect: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying and/or reach

Haste.Effect: This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control

Hexproof.Effect: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control

Indestructible.Effect: Effects that say destroy donâ€™t destroy this

Lifelink.Effect: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life

Menace.Effect: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures

Protection.Effect: This can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything [quality]

Reach.Effect: This creature can block creatures with flying

Trample.Effect: This creature can deal excess combat damage to player or planeswalker it's attacking

Vigilance.Effect: Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap
